channel.title: Shard Commands
channel.description: I dont understand how the system works. Can anyone explain it to me?

item.title: Shard Commands
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:3, topic:382922”][quote author=Rash link=topic=478705.msg3504387#msg3504387 date=1298030879]
I dont understand how the system works.
Can anyone explain it to me?
[/quote]
What exactly were you trying to understand? Also if I were you, I’d rewrite it such that you wouldn’t need a class per command.[/quote]

Exactly how it works.
I was looking at it earlier, and couldnt figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Shard Commands
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:1, topic:382922”]I dont understand how the system works.
Can anyone explain it to me?[/quote]
What exactly were you trying to understand? Also if I were you, I’d rewrite it such that you wouldn’t need a class per command.

Read full topic

item.title: Shard Commands
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I haven’t used Shard in forever, but I believe it uses a HashMap to handle the commands. So, the HashMap handles the <Command, String> and parses the ::commandName as the String, then to the given Command (the class for the command)

Then the class inherits a general command interface, and handles the command’s actions there.

Hope this explains a bit.[/quote]

Thanks.
Can I grab your msn, I want to talk to you

Read full topic
